flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=12>>12 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 12 cows + 24 cows = <<12+24=36>>36 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 36 cows + 43 cows = <<36+43=79>>79 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 79 cows + 8 cows = <<79+8=87>>87 cows.
#### 87

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
